Subject: EPP Memory alert in AWS
Description:
Hi,
We have received AWS alerts on EPP side regarding the memory usage in AWS of your EPP server.
The Memory usage seems to reach 90% sometimes.
What_We_Know__c:
We did the following:
- upgraded the EPP server from 5700 to 5941(latest version)
- rebooted the EPP server
- cleared space in the backend
- set Audit Log Backups to also backup and remove logs older than 1 month from the EPP server(currently there were almost 1.5 mil logs - this may have caused performance issues)

What remains to be done: When you have time please upgrade the EPP clients to the latest version. The latest version can be downloaded from System Configuration -> Client Software.
---
Optimized EPP server.
Next_Steps__c:
Waiting till next week to make sure that everything is okay and then we will close the ticket. 
---
Waiting on customer for a remote session to take a look over policies, shadows, etc.
Solution_Comment__c:
As we spoke we did the following:
- upgraded the EPP server from 5700 to 5941(latest version)
- rebooted the EPP server
- cleared space in the backend
- set Audit Log Backups to also backup and remove logs older than 1 month from the EPP server(currently there were almost 1.5 mil logs - this may have caused performance issues)

What remains to be done: When you have time please upgrade the EPP clients to the latest version. The latest version can be downloaded from System Configuration -> Client Software.
